data.title: The Greatest Dutch Football Players
data.meta_description: The World would have been much poorer without these famous Dutch Football Players!
data.text:
1

Patrick Kluivert

(Retired Dutch Football Striker)

34

15

Birthdate: July 1, 1976

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Amsterdam, Netherlands

Patrick Kluivert was one of the star Dutch footballers of his time who played as a striker for clubs such as Ajax, Barcelona, and AC Milan. The UEFA Euro 2000 Golden Boot winner has also managed teams such as Netherlands and Cameroon. He later held administrative positions at Paris Saint-Germain and Barcelona.

2

Johan Cruyff

(One of the Greatest Football Players & One of the Best Managers Ever)

101

24

Birthdate: April 25, 1947

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Amsterdam, Netherlands

Died: March 24, 2016

Dutch midfielder/forward Johan Cruyff pioneered the idea of Total Football, along with coach Rinus Michels. The first three-time Ballon d'Or-winner was known for his signature move, the Cruyff Turn. He made it to FIFA 100 and ranked second only to Pele in an official World Player of the Century poll.

3

Arjen Robben

(Dutch Former Professional Football Player Who Played as a Winger)

30

12

Birthdate: January 23, 1984

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: Bedum, Netherlands

Widely considered one of the best Dutch soccer players of all time, Arjen Robben is known for his long-range shots, ball control, speed, and dribbling skills. He helped his national team reach the finals of the 2010 FIFA World Cup, which they lost to Spain.

Recommended Lists:

4

Nathan Aké

(Dutch Footballer Who Plays as a Defender)

24

6

Birthdate: February 18, 1995

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: The Hague, Netherlands

Nathan Aké is a Dutch football player who plays for the Netherlands national football team and Manchester City. In 2019, he helped his national team win the runner-up trophy at the UEFA Nations League. Nathan Aké was also part of the Manchester City Football Club that won the Premier League in 2021 and 2022.

5

Virgil van Dijk

(Professional Footballer Who Plays as a Centre-Back)

81

18

Birthdate: July 8, 1991

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Breda, Netherlands

Dutch footballer Virgil van Dijk plays as a defender for Liverpool and has won several titles, such as a Premier League, with them. Starting his senior career with Groningen, he later played for teams such as Celtic and Southampton. He is the only defender to be named the UEFA Men's Player of the Year.

6

Ruud Gullit

(One of the Greatest Football Players of All Time)

68

14

Birthdate: September 1, 1962

Sun Sign: Virgo

Birthplace: Amsterdam, Netherlands

Ruud Gullit is a Dutch former football player. Considered one of the greatest players in the history of football, Gullit was known for his versatility as he could play as an attacking midfielder, forward, or midfielder. During the 1988 UEFA European Football Championship, he led his national team to its first title.

7

Robin van Persie

(One of the Best Football Strikers of His Generation)

25

11

Birthdate: August 6, 1983

Sun Sign: Leo

Birthplace: Rotterdam, Netherlands

Once one of the world’s highest-paid athletes, Dutch football coach and retired footballer Robin van Persie is also known as one of the greatest strikers of his time. He had successful stints with Arsenal and Manchester United and was also part of the Dutch squad that was the 2010 FIFA World Cup runner-up.

8

Marco van Basten

(One of the Greatest Football Strikers of All Time)

24

8

Birthdate: October 31, 1964

Sun Sign: Scorpio

Birthplace: Utrecht, Netherlands

Dutch footballer Marco van Basten is known for his successful stints at Ajax and Milan and won the Champions League thrice with the latter. However, an ankle injury cut his career short. The three-time Ballon d'Or winner later took over as the manager of Ajax and the Dutch national team.

9

Dennis Bergkamp

(Dutch Retired Football Forward)

27

15

Birthdate: May 10, 1969

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Amsterdam, Netherlands

Dutch football coach and retired player Dennis Bergkamp had a successful playing career with clubs such as Ajax, Arsenal, and Inter Milan. Initially a midfielder, he later played as a striker. The 2-time FIFA World Player of the Year bronze winner also gained the nickname the Non-Flying Dutchman for his fear of flying.

10

Clarence Seedorf

(Dutch Professional Football Manager and Former Player Who is Considered One of the Best Midfielders of His Generation)

19

8

Birthdate: April 1, 1976

Sun Sign: Aries

Birthplace: Paramaribo, Suriname

Clarence Seedorf is a Dutch former football player. Widely considered one of the best midfielders of his era, Seedorf was included in Pelé's FIFA 100 list in 2004. Having won several continental and domestic titles for clubs in the Netherlands, Brazil, Italy, and Spain, Clarence Seedorf is one of the most celebrated and decorated Dutch players of all time.

11

Frank Rijkaard

(Dutch Former Football Player and Former Manager Who Played as a Defensive Midfielder)

12

1

Birthdate: September 30, 1962

Sun Sign: Libra

Birthplace: Amsterdam, Netherlands

Dutch footballer and former manager Franklin Rijkaard has represented clubs such as Ajax, Real Zaragoza, and A.C. Milan. He has also coached clubs such as Barcelona and Sparta Rotterdam and the Dutch and Saudi Arabian national teams. He has also earned the 2005-2006 UEFA Manager of the Year honor.

12

Tahith Chong

(Dutch Professional Football Winger)

19

5

Birthdate: December 4, 1999

Sun Sign: Sagittarius

Birthplace: Willemstad, Curaçao

Though born to a Curaçao-based footballer, Dutch footballer Tahith Chong had never watched football before the 2006 World Cup. He left for the Netherlands to train at 8 and never looked back. The Manchester United winger, who is currently on loan with Club Brugge, is of African and Chinese descent.

13

Ryan Babel

(Dutch Footballer Who Can Play as a Striker or Left Winger)

19

6

Birthdate: December 19, 1986

Sun Sign: Sagittarius

Birthplace: Amsterdam, Netherlands

Dutch footballer Ryan Babel who plays as both a striker and a midfielder, currently represents the Turkish club Eyüpspor. Starting his senior career with Ajax, he won both the KNVB Cup and the Eredivisie twice with them. He was also part of the 2010 FIFA World Cup runner-up Dutch team.

14

Dirk Kuyt

(Former Dutch Footballer Who Played as a Striker and Winger)

20

7

Birthdate: July 22, 1980

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Katwijk, Netherlands

Dirk Kuyt is a Dutch retired football player who played for the Netherlands national football team from 2004 to 2014. He represented his country at important tournaments, including the 2006, 2010, and 2014 World Cups. In 2006, he was named Dutch Footballer of the Year. Dirk Kuyt was also an important player for popular clubs like Liverpool and Fenerbahçe.

15

Jaap Stam

(One of the Greatest Football Defenders of His Time)

21

4

Birthdate: July 17, 1972

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Kampen, Netherlands

Dutch football coach and retired footballer Jaap Stam is regarded as one of the greatest defenders of his time. Starting his senior career with FC Zwolle, he later had successful stints with clubs such as Manchester United, Ajax, and PSV. Post-retirement, he has also coached teams such as Reading and PEC Zwolle.

16

Xavi Simons

(Dutch Professional Footballer Who Plays as a Midfielder)

7

3

Birthdate: April 21, 2003

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Amsterdam, Netherlands

Height: 5'6" (168 cm)

17

Luuk de Jong

(Dutch Professional Footballer Who Plays as a Striker)

23

6

Birthdate: August 27, 1990

Sun Sign: Virgo

Birthplace: Aigle, Switzerland

Height: 6'2" (188 cm)

18

Frenkie de Jong

(Dutch Footballer Who Plays as a Midfielder)

13

3

Birthdate: May 12, 1997

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Gorinchem, Netherlands

Frenkie de Jong is a Dutch football player who is currently playing for his national team. In 2019, he was part of the team that won the runner-up trophy at the UEFA Nations League. Renowned for his technique, attacking prowess, passing, and dribbling skills, Frenkie de Jong has also been an important player for Barcelona since 2019.

19

Georginio Wijnaldum

(Dutch Football Midfielder)

15

5

Birthdate: November 11, 1990

Sun Sign: Scorpio

Birthplace: Rotterdam, Netherlands

Dutch footballer Georginio Wijnaldum plays as a midfielder for the Italian club Roma and the French club Paris Saint-Germain. Starting his youth career with Feyenoord, as the youngest-ever player of the club, he later had successful stints with Liverpool and PSV and was the 2014 FIFA World Cup third-place-winning Dutch squad.

20

Matthijs de Ligt

(Dutch Professional Footballer Who Plays as a Centre-Back)

15

5

Birthdate: August 12, 1999

Sun Sign: Leo

Birthplace: Leiderdorp, Netherlands

Dutch footballer Matthijs de Ligt currently plays for Serie A club Juventus and the Netherlands national team as a center-back. Making his debut in 2016, he became the youngest player ever to play in a major European final the following year. Football pundits consider him to among the most highly regarded young prospects in world football.

21

Guus Hiddink

(Former Dutch Footballer Who Played as a Midfielder)

17

4

Birthdate: November 8, 1946

Sun Sign: Scorpio

Birthplace: Varsseveld, Netherlands

Guus Hiddink is a Dutch retired footballer who played as a midfielder. He retired as a player in 1982 and started focusing on his career as a manager. Hiddink achieved immense success as a manager as he guided many clubs and countries to achieve various titles. In 2005 and 2006, Guus Hiddink was honored with the prestigious Rinus Michels Award.

22

Jimmy Floyd Hasselbaink

(Former Dutch Footballer Who Played as a Striker)

22

4

Birthdate: March 27, 1972

Sun Sign: Aries

Birthplace: Paramaribo, Suriname

Jimmy Floyd Hasselbaink is a Dutch former football player who played for the Netherlands national football team from 1998 to 2002. He also played for popular clubs like Chelsea and Atlético Madrid. After retiring as a player, Jimmy Floyd Hasselbaink pursued a career as a football manager. He has managed teams like Burton Albion, Queens Park Rangers, and Northampton Town.

23

Memphis Depay

(Dutch Football Forward)

12

8

Birthdate: February 13, 1994

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: Moordrecht, Netherlands

Dutch footballer Memphis Depay is best known as a forward for Barcelona. Starting his senior career with PSV Eindhoven, he later also played for Manchester United and Lyon. He was also part of the 2014 FIFA World Cup third-place-winning Dutch squad and was the Eredivisie top scorer in 2014-15.

24

Cody Gakpo

(Dutch Professional Footballer Who Plays as a Forward)

5

1

Birthdate: May 7, 1999

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Eindhoven, Netherlands

Height: 6'2" (188 cm)

25

Wesley Sneijder

(Retired Footballer Who Was One of the Best Midfielders of His Time)

10

5

Birthdate: June 9, 1984

Sun Sign: Gemini

Birthplace: Utrecht, Netherlands

Retired Dutch footballer Wesley Sneijder was known as one of the best midfielders of his time. Starting his senior career with Ajax, he later had successful stints with Real Madrid, Inter Milan, and Galatasaray. He was also part of the Dutch squad that became the 2010 FIFA World Cup runner-up.

26

Ruud van Nistelrooy

(Former Dutch Football Striker)

24

9

Birthdate: July 1, 1976

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Geffen, Netherlands

Ruud van Nistelrooy is a Dutch former football player who is widely regarded as one of the best strikers in the history of football. In 2004, he was included in Pele's FIFA 100 list. Ruud van Nistelrooy played for the Netherlands national football team from 1998 to 2011, during which he represented the team in several important tournaments.

27

Edwin van der Sar

(Former Dutch Football Goalkeeper)

12

3

Birthdate: October 29, 1970

Sun Sign: Scorpio

Birthplace: Voorhout, Netherlands

Ajax CEO and retired Dutch footballer Edwin van der Sar began his senior career with Ajax, winning countless titles with them, such as the Eredivisie and the UEFA Champion’s League. The talented goalkeeper later had successful stints with Juventus, Fulham, and Manchester United. He has also been a 2-time Best European Goalkeeper.

28

Edgar Davids

(Retired Surinamese-Dutch Football Defensive Midfielder)

7

3

Birthdate: March 13, 1973

Sun Sign: Pisces

Birthplace: Paramaribo, Suriname

Born in Suriname, footballer Edgar Davids moved to the Netherlands as an infant and grew up to start his youth football career with Ajax. The retired Dutch defensive midfielder had successful stints with Ajax, Juventus, and Inter Milan. He also played for the Dutch national team, which he now serves as an assistant coach.

29

Justin Kluivert

(Dutch Professional Footballer Who Plays as a Winger)

6

3

Birthdate: May 5, 1999

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Amsterdam, Netherlands

Height: 5'7" (170 cm)

30

Klaas Jan Huntelaar

(Retired Dutch Football Striker)

19

4

Birthdate: 1983 AD

Birthplace: Bronckhorst

Retired Dutch footballer Klaas Jan Huntelaar, who played as a striker, had successful stints with club such as Ajax and Schalke 04, winning the KNVB Cup thrice with the former, among other championships. He was also part of the Dutch squad that became the runner-up at the 2010 FIFA World Cup.

31

Nordin Amrabat

(Dutch-Born Moroccan Footballer Who Plays as a Midfielder)

17

4

Birthdate: March 31, 1987

Sun Sign: Aries

Birthplace: Naarden, Netherlands

Nordin Amrabat is a Dutch-born Moroccan football player. After representing the Dutch national team at youth levels, Amrabat went on to play for the Morocco national team from 2011 to 2019. He played for Morocco in important tournaments like Africa Cup of Nations and the 2012 Summer Olympics. Nordin Amrabat currently plays for AEK Athens.

32

Daley Blind

(Dutch Professional Footballer Who Plays as a Defensive Midfielder)

19

4

Birthdate: March 9, 1990

Sun Sign: Pisces

Birthplace: Amsterdam, Netherlands

Height: 5'11" (180 cm)

33

Abdelhak Nouri

(Dutch Former Professional Footballer Who Played as a Midfielder)

5

1

Birthdate: April 2, 1997

Sun Sign: Aries

Birthplace: Amsterdam, Netherlands

Height: 5'7" (170 cm)

38

Ronald Koeman

(Dutch Professional Football Manager and Former Player Who Played as a Defender and as a Midfielder)

15

24

Birthdate: March 21, 1963

Sun Sign: Aries

Birthplace: Zaandam, Netherlands

Dutch formerfootball player Ronald Koeman was one of the stars of the Netherlands national team during his playing days. After his retirement, he became a professional football manager and is currently the head coach of La Liga club Barcelona. Tremendously successful as a head coach, he was made the manager of Barcelona in 2020.

39

Quincy Promes

(Dutch Footballer Who Plays as a Forward or Midfielder)

20

5

Birthdate: January 4, 1992

Sun Sign: Capricorn

Birthplace: Amsterdam, Netherlands

Quincy Promes is a Dutch football player who plays for the Netherlands national football team as an attacking midfielder or striker. In 2019, he helped his team win the silver medal at the UEFA Nations League. In 2017, Quincy Promes was named Futbol Footballer of the Year, Sport Express Footballer of the Year, and Soccer Footballer of the Year.

40

Ryan Gravenberch

(Dutch Professional Footballer Who Plays as a Midfielder)

6

1

Birthdate: May 16, 2002

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Amsterdam, Netherlands

Height: 6'3" (190 cm)

41

Giovanni van Bronckhorst

(Former Dutch Footballer Who Played as a Midfielder and Defender)

19

3

Birthdate: February 5, 1975

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: Rotterdam, Netherlands

Giovanni van Bronckhorst is a Dutch former football player who played as a midfielder and defender for the Netherlands national football team from 1996 to 2010. He helped his team win the runner-up trophy at the 2010 FIFA World Cup. Apart from his national team, Giovanni van Bronckhorst also played for popular clubs like Barcelona and Arsenal.

42

Gregory van der Wiel

(Former Dutch Footballer Who Played as a Right-Back)

16

6

Birthdate: February 3, 1988

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: Amsterdam, Netherlands

Gregory van der Wiel is a Dutch retired football player who played for the Netherlands national football team from 2009 to 2015, during which he represented his country at important tournaments including the 2010 FIFA World Cup, where they won the runner-up trophy. A versatile defender, Gregory van der Wiel also played for popular clubs like Ajax and Paris Saint-Germain.

43

Danny Blind

(Former Dutch Footballer Who Played as a Defender)

15

3

Birthdate: August 1, 1961

Sun Sign: Leo

Birthplace: Oost-Souburg, Netherlands

Danny Blind is a Dutch former footballer who played as a defender for the Netherlands national football team from 1986 to 1996. An important player for the Netherlands, Blind competed at major tournaments including two World Cups and two European Championships. After retiring as a player, Danny Blind established himself as a manager for teams like Ajax and the Netherlands.

44

Noussair Mazraoui

(Dutch Professional Footballer Who Plays as a Full-Back or Central Midfielder)

7

1

Birthdate: November 14, 1997

Sun Sign: Scorpio

Birthplace: Leiderdorp, Netherlands

Height: 6'0" (183 cm)

45

Timothy Fosu-Mensah

(Dutch Professional Footballer Who Plays as a Defensive Midfielder / Centre-Back)

4

2

Birthdate: January 2, 1998

Sun Sign: Capricorn

Birthplace: Amsterdam, Netherlands

Height: 6'1" (185 cm)

46

Lieke Martens

(Dutch Football Winger/Midfielder)

22

5

Birthdate: December 16, 1992

Sun Sign: Sagittarius

Birthplace: Bergen, Netherlands

Dutch footballer Lieke Martens plays as a winger/midfielder for the French club Paris Saint-Germain Féminine. She was 5 when she began training in football. She has won the 2020-21 UEFA Women's Champions League with Barcelona and was part of the 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup runner-up Dutch squad.

47

Jordi Cruyff

(Dutch Football Coach and Retired Attacking Midfielder)

17

3

Birthdate: February 9, 1974

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: Amsterdam, Netherlands

The son of former footballer and coach Johan Cruyff, Jordi Cruyff too has been a talented footballer in his own right and is now a coach. The retired Dutch attacking midfielder is now the sporting director of Barcelona. As a player, he has had successful stints with Barcelona and Manchester United.

48

Michel Vorm

(Former Dutch Footballer Who Played as a Goalkeeper)

15

4

Birthdate: October 20, 1983

Sun Sign: Libra

Birthplace: IJsselstein, Netherlands

Michel Vorm is a Dutch retired football player who played as a goalkeeper for the Netherlands national football team between 2008 and 2014. He was part of the team that won the silver medal and bronze medal at the 2010 and 2014 FIFA World Cup, respectively. Michel Vorm also played for prominent clubs like Swansea City and Tottenham Hotspur.

49

Kevin Strootman

(Dutch Professional Footballer Who Plays as a Defensive Midfielder)

14

4

Birthdate: February 13, 1990

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: Ridderkerk, Netherlands

Height: 6'2" (188 cm)
